transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Yashwant sir Namaskar.
Customer: Ji boliye sir.
Executive: Deepak baat kar raha hu sir Indiamart se.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ha sir kal sham me sir aapka feedback aaya tha ki third party CRM API ke liye.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ji sir to mai aapko batana chahta hu sir ki hum log ka jo API hai sir jo aapka jo package chal raha hai jo aapka basic package hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To is package me sir API nahi hota hai matlab hum log ka API ka separate package hai jisme aap jo costing hai sir 10000 plus GST hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ha to 10000 plus GST me sir matlab fir hum log aapko API provide karte hai.
Customer: 10000 plus lagega yu 18% 18% GST matlab 1180 ho gaya na 11000 se.
Executive: Ha 1180 ye karte hai to fir hum aapko API provide karte hai sir.
Customer: Yu
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Thik hai sir din me din me kuch karte hai ya kal karte hai.
Executive: Kya karte hai sir?
Customer: Din me payment karte hai karna to padega.
Executive: To abhi open kar lijiye sir mai aapko bata deta hu.
Customer: Nahi mai to abhi to sir bahar hu.
Executive: Dukan pe pahunch ke karta hu.
Customer: Achcha to kitne baje call kar lu sir?
Customer: Nahi chala ke aapko call kar lunga pahle.
Executive: Achcha chalo thik hai to ye sir aapne feedback diya tha aapne feedback diya tha sir API ke liye.
Customer: Ha API ke liye ye close kar dunga abhi feedback aapka.
Executive: Ha kar kar kar do sir.
Executive: Thik hai sir jab bhi mere message de dijiyega jab bhi aap aayega office me mujhe message kar dijiyega mai aapko wo pura link bana kar de dunga thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai sir okay thank you.
Customer: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs third party CRM API.

Resolution:

- Executive informed about API separate package costing.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will call after reaching the shop.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- api, crm, feedback, payment
